titleStmt.title: A faire vvarning Declaring the comfortable vse both of sicknesse and health. Deliuered in seuerall sermons at Saint Maries in Douer, by Iohn Reading minister and preacher of Gods words.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop, for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
